Race.SpecificTitle: Hospital Service District No. 1-A -- 7.90 Mills - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Hospital Service District No. 1-A of the Parish of Richland, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy and collect a special tax of seven and ninety hundredths (7.90) mills on all property subject to taxation in the District authorized to be levied (an estimated $774,958 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2021 to and including the year 2030, for the purposes of constructing, maintaining, improving and operating the hospital facilities of the District, including the purchase of equipment therefore?
